overview: First of the 3 original, world famous Monster Truck shows to ever appear on National Television and home video. A favorite of fans young and old, see history making firsts with side-by-side monster truck car crushing races, 1974 Ford Bigfoot and Bigfoot IV, truck pulling, dragster tractors, flaming funny cars, bus crushing, mud bogging, world's biggest truck, more. Own or watch your copy today.
title: Battle of the Monster Trucks
